title: Primož Roglič Part of Stacked Red Bull Team for Vuelta a España: ‘We Want to Compete Aggressively for the GC’
content:
Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe confirms return to racing of three-time Vuelta winner Roglič, and unveils strong GC squad.

Read the full article at Primož Roglič Part of Stacked Red Bull Team for Vuelta a España: ‘We Want to Compete Aggressively for the GC’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
